summary: Upon arriving at Warsaw, Marcin, a young mysterious stranger from afar, enters the lives of hedonistic Ola and her liberal well-off parents. He's got a secret plan and just waits for a convenient moment to make it happen.
cast: Marcin Kowalczyk|Jasmina Polak|Agnieszka Wosinska|Janusz Chabior|Ewa Skonieczna|Krzysztof Skonieczny|Szymon Nowak|Lech Lotocki|Maciej Nawrocki|Grzegorz Goch|Bartlomiej Kotschedoff|Ernest Lorek|Radoslaw Rutkowski|Agnieszka Zulewska|Piotr Zurawski
title: Hardkor Disko
